review: I was thrilled to receive the Guild Wars 2 Collector's Edition, and it did not disappoint. The physical items, like the Rytlock figurine and the Making of Guild Wars 2 book, are beautifully crafted and add a special touch to my collection. The game itself is engaging with a rich storyline and diverse gameplay, though I wish the digital items were a bit more substantial. Overall, it's a great package for any fan of the game.
